title: PlotSquared插件显示
author: longding@a
txt_content: 1.12.2海绵端的PlotSquared插件怎么取消掉进入地皮提示

replies.author: monseasd
replies.txt_content: /p set flag   或许可以帮助你

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 那你去这里看看？这是PlotSquared插件的百科，里面的命令挺全的
